topic.title: IPFS video hash file
topic.body:
Im getting this message when I am trying to play a IPFS video hash file in a browser
Path Resolve error: no link named "play" under QmfCVnoQiRnC72C4xyTKwfSg53EP6MzMXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX. It works fine if I copy the link to a VLC player.

topic.title: Zeronet+Tails
topic.body: Is it possible to run zeronet on tails?
